extendedIngredients.name: buffalo wing sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/2 bottle Texas Pete Buffalo Sauce...or your favorite wing sauce

extendedIngredients.name: italian cheese blend
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package shred cheese...any blend will do

recipes.title: Buffalo Chicken Dip â€“ all the flavor of hot wings in a dip

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are great choices for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. You could try District 7 Estate Chardonnay. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 18 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: District 7 Estate Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Our 2012 vintage has aromas of tropical fruit and butterscotch that lead into a lively blend of pear, pineapple and citrus flavors

recipes.instructions: In saucepan over medium heat combine all ingredients until well blended without lumps. serve with tortilla chips or triscuit crackers.

steps.step: In saucepan over medium heat combine all ingredients until well blended without lumps. serve with tortilla chips or triscuit crackers.
